text:
Donald Trump banned Chinese travel on 01/31/20

The New York Times, 02/05/20:

“Who Says It’s Not Safe to Travel to China?”

The New York Times, 04/12/20:

“President Trump was Slow to Absorb the Scale of the Risk of Coronavirus”

Dishonest reporting is a threat to our country.
